definition: unique skill/unexpected tricky move (as a last resort)/masterstroke/finishing blow
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
to recruit/to provoke/to beckon/to incur/to infect/contagious/a move (chess)/a maneuver/device/trick/to confess

sentences.english: See small trick, the Indus to golden phoenix.
sentences.chinese: 且看小伙有绝招，梧桐来了金凤凰。

sentences.english: Do not try any of those daredevil stunts .
sentences.chinese: 不要耍那些不怕死的绝招。

sentences.english: Lucy: If you're ever in an argument, you can always trump with a dead mother.
sentences.chinese: 如果相持不下就使出你死老妈子的绝招。

sentences.english: But when I was young, there was a sure way of telling a man's age.
sentences.chinese: 但是在我年轻的时候，我有一个辨别男人年龄的绝招。

sentences.english: Touching stories are masterstrokes of Pixar.
sentences.chinese: 感动人心的剧情才是皮克斯的绝招。

sentences.english: DailyRT's advanced search features, however, make this new service stand out from the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 但它的绝招是高级搜索。

sentences.english: Don't despair. I've been using this trick for years with my point-and-shoot cameras.
sentences.chinese: 别失望，我有个绝招，在我的傻瓜DC上使用多年了。

sentences.english: Color can be your most powerful design element if you learn to use it effectively.
sentences.chinese: 只要你学会了有效使用色彩，它会成为你的设计绝招。

sentences.english: To date, the hook has been email.
sentences.chinese: 迄今为止，雅虎的绝招一直是其电邮服务。

sentences.english: Do martial art training trick type, then silence speaks.
sentences.chinese: 练拳莫练绝招式，此时无声胜有声。

sentences.english: I knew you could do the magic.
sentences.chinese: 我早就知道你有一套绝招。

sentences.english: Is there a “silver bullet” that can help to companies to solve identification problems?
sentences.chinese: 帮助企业解决身份标识的问题，有什么绝招吗？

sentences.english: The card game had been going badly for him, so he decided to bring out his big guns .
sentences.chinese: 这局牌已对他不利，所以他决定使出绝招来击败对手。

definition: move (in chess, on stage, in martial arts)/gambit/trick/scheme/movement/same as 著數|着数[zhao1 shu4]
to use fully/to put to use
to create/to come up with (an idea etc)
smart move/clever way of doing sth
Buddha's teaching/Buddhist monk's apparel, staff etc/(Daoism) magic weapon/talisman/fig. specially effective device/magic wand
